criteria: Understanding of common myths related to alcohol, tobacco, and other drug use among adolescents.
Ability to differentiate between facts and myths regarding substance use prevalence among adolescents.
Communication of clarified information to dispel myths effectively.
descriptions: Demonstrates no understanding of common myths or misconceptions.
Identifies one or two myths but struggles to provide accurate information.
Identifies some common myths but has difficulty explaining the facts accurately.
Identifies several myths and provides some accurate information, but may still perpetuate some misconceptions.
Clearly identifies most common myths and provides accurate information, demonstrating a solid understanding.
Thoroughly identifies and debunks common myths with accurate information, demonstrating a comprehensive understanding and ability to explain these concepts clearly.
Unable to differentiate between facts and myths regarding prevalence.
Struggles to distinguish facts from myths; demonstrates confusion about the scope of substance use.
Shows some ability to differentiate between facts and myths, but still accepts some misconceptions.
Generally differentiates between facts and myths, using data but still may not provide a good overview.
Clearly differentiates between facts and myths, using data to support their claims and providing a good overview of prevalence.
Masterfully differentiates between facts and myths, presenting data on prevalence, and explains the implications of both the myths and the realities with sophistication.
Unable to communicate any clear information to dispel myths.
Attempts to communicate information, but is unclear and perpetuates misinformation.
Communicates some clarified information, but not very effectively and may be confusing.
Communicates clarified information adequately, but without much clarity or impact.
Communicates clarified information clearly and effectively, dispelling myths and providing accurate data.
Communicates clarified information masterfully, dispelling myths effectively and presenting accurate data with sophistication and clarity.
